home.title_2: Home bookkeeping for family budget planning
home.text_2: Keep a record of personal finances and the finances of all your family members. To ensure privacy, each user's records can be password protected
home.title_3: To keep track of personal finances, expenses and income
home.text_3: Enter all your expenses and income into Home Bookkeeping to keep your finances under complete control. Build your financial plans and budget, keep track of income and expenses.
home.title_4: Enter your loans and borrowed money into Home Bookkeeping.
home.text_4: Full control of loans and money lent, including control of their return with the functions of calculating the payment schedule and reminders.
home.title_5: Manage your home budget in any currency in the world
home.text-5: The list of currencies in Home Bookkeeping contains all the currencies of the world. Select the currencies that you use to account for personal finances.
home.title_6: Use Home Bookkeeping on different devices
home.text_6: The synchronization function allows you to exchange data with Home Accounting installed on another computer or on an Android, iPhone, iPad mobile device.
home.title_7: Visual reports and charts - a simple and convenient tool for analysis
home.text_7: Home bookkeeping will help you analyze your finances with a variety of reports and visual charts.
home.text_8: Import your bank statements into Home Bookkeeping. If you need to transfer data from Home Bookkeeping somewhere, then the export function will help with this.
home.title_9: Your data is under reliable protection
home.text-9: With a reliable backup system, be sure that your data is always completely safe and you will never lose it.
